oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Harlan Howard Written Song Recordings - Tape 4
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The series of recordings features a variety of tracks written by Harlan Howard. The tracks are performed by a variety of artists including: Wanda Jackson, Jean Shepard, Tex Ritter, Ernest Tubb, Jimmy Newman, Roy Drusky, Jan Howard, Wynn Stewart, and Johnny Cash. The tracks are from a variety of unidentified dates. The tape is the forth in a series of eight.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Harlan Howard
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) If I Cried Every Time You Hurt Me (Wanda Jackson) -- (02:24) Lonely Little World (Jean Shepard) -- (04:39) The Gun, the Gold and the Girl (Tex Ritter) -- (07:02) I Never Could Say No (Ernest Tubb) -- (09:32) Everything (Jimmy Newman) -- (11:53) You Never Cried (When You Were Mine) (Roy Drusky) -- (13:49) Wrong Company (Jan Howard and Wynn Stewart) -- (15:59) We'll Never Love Again (Jan Howard and Wynn Stewart) -- (18:17) I've Got My Pride (Jan Howard) -- (20:25) I Wish I Was a Single Girl Again (Jan Howard) -- (22:41) Just Another Girl (Jean Shepard) -- (25:01) Still in Town (Johnny Cash)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Jackson, Wanda, 1937-; Shepard, Jean, 1933-; Shepard, Jean, 1933-2016; Ritter, Tex; Ritter, Tex, 1905-1974; Tubb, Ernest; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Newman, Jimmy C.; Drusky, Roy; Howard, Jan (Vocalist); Howard, Harlan; Stewart, Wynn; Cash, Johnny; Cash, Johnny, 1932-2003;
